50411 Tartu linn,

EST

description.en: Both in the University of Tartu and abroad, summer schools, one-time courses, etc. are offered for the professional development of doctoral students. Such courses are usually more efficient for the development of doctoral students than the specific subjects that the curriculum can offer. The curriculum also fails to anticipate the professional development needs of each individual doctoral student. The aim of the course is to stimulate the PhD students to use the high level educational resources that are outside of the core curriculum.
description.et: Nii Tartu Ülikoolis kui väljaspool pakutakse doktorantide erialaseks enesetäienduseks suvekoole, ühekordseid kursuseid jne. Sellised ained on doktorantide arenguks tavaliselt olulisemad kui spetsiifilised ained, mida õppekava suudab pakkuda. Samuti ei suuda õppekava näha ette iga konkreetse doktorandi erialase arengu vajadusi. Aine eesmärgiks on see, et doktorandid sellist enesetäiendust läbiksid.

objectives.en: Both in the University of Tartu and abroad, summer schools, one-time courses, etc. are offered for the professional development of doctoral students. Such courses are usually more efficient for the development of doctoral students than the specific subjects that the curriculum can offer. The curriculum also fails to anticipate the professional development needs of each individual doctoral student. The aim of the course is to stimulate the PhD students to use the high level educational resources that are outside of the core curriculum.
objectives.et: Nii Tartu Ülikoolis kui väljaspool pakutakse doktorantide erialaseks enesetäienduseks suvekoole, ühekordseid kursuseid jne. Sellised ained on doktorantide arenguks tavaliselt olulisemad kui spetsiifilised ained, mida õppekava suudab pakkuda. Samuti ei suuda õppekava näha ette iga konkreetse doktorandi erialase arengu vajadusi. Aine eesmärgiks on see, et doktorandid sellist enesetäiendust läbiksid.

learning_outcomes.en: The doctoral student has developed his / her professional skills through various courses, summer schools, specific trainings, etc
learning_outcomes.et: Doktorant on oma erialaseid oskuseid arendanud läbi erinevate kursuste, suvekoolide, spetsiifiliste koolituste jne läbi.

learning_outcomes.en: Proof of completion must be provided.
learning_outcomes.et: Tuleb esitada ürituste läbimist tõendavad dokumendid.
